welcome.title: Welcome to SNX staking
welcome.subtitle: The dApp for SNX holders. If you've never staked SNX before, read through this quick introduction first.

what.title: What is Synthetix?
what.subtitle: Synthetix is a derivatives liquidity protocol on Ethereum. It enables the creation of synthetic assets (Synths) by staking SNX, and these Synths can be traded for each other directly with the Synthetix smart contracts on dApps such as Kwenta.

why.title: Why stake SNX?
why.subtitle: SNX stakers receive two kinds of rewards. Firstly, they receive SNX staking rewards, which are created through the inflationary monetary policy. Secondly, there’s Synth exchange rewards, which are denominated in sUSD and generated by all peer-to-contract Synth trades.

mint-burn.title: Minting & Burning
mint-burn.subtitle: All Synths need to be backed by staked SNX at a Target Collateralisation Ratio, configurable by community governance. SNX stakers need to manage their own ratio to be above this figure, which they can do by burning sUSD to increase their ratio or minting sUSD to reduce it. If they do this, they can collect weekly rewards.

risks.title: What are the risks?
risks.subtitle: All SNX stakers create a ‘debt’ when they stake. Their debt begins as the amount of sUSD they initially mint, and fluctuates according to gains or losses made by other Synth holders. Any time anyone holds a Synth that appreciates in value, that gain is distributed proportionally between all the staked SNX holders’ debts. A staker must pay off their debt before they can unlock their staked SNX.

mint.title: Mint sUSD by staking SNX
mint.subtitle: Mint sUSD by staking your SNX. SNX stakers earn weekly staking rewards in exchange for managing their Collateralization Ratio and debt. Learn more from our <0>staking guide</0> and <1>litepaper</1>.
mint.min-stake-time: Your staked SNX will be locked for {{duration}} days
mint.liq-warning: If your C-Ratio goes below {{liquidationRatioPercent}} and you've been flagged, you must increase it to {{targetCratioPercent}} or you will be penalized

burn.title: Burn sUSD to unstake SNX
burn.subtitle: Burn your sUSD debt to unlock your staked SNX. This will increase your Collateralization Ratio and reduce your debt. <0>Learn more.</0>

clear.title: Clear debt by buying more sUSD via 1inch
clear.subtitle: Burn your sUSD to unlock your staked SNX and clear your debt. As you don’t have enough sUSD, buy more with ETH in the left form. <0>Learn more.</0>

flag-warning.title: Your account has been flagged for liquidation!
flag-warning.info: After {{deadlineDate}} you can be liquidated, which incur penalities. To avoid this, burn your <0>C-RATIO back to {{percentageTargetCRatio}}</0> or self liquidate. <1>Read more about liquidation here</1>

info.ratios: Your C-Ratio {{cRatio}} is below the target C-Ratio of {{targetCRatio}}.
info.burn-amount: To get your C-Ratio back to the target of {{targetCRatio}} you need to burn {{burnAmountToFixCRatio}}. Your current balance is {{balance}}.
info.c-ratio-ok: Your C-Ratio of {{cRatio}} is above the target C-Ratio of {{targetCRatio}} which means you can't and dont have to self liquidate.
info.not-staking: Currently you are not staking, so there's no debt to self liquidate. Head over to the Mint tab to start earning.
info.enough-susd-balance: To get your C-Ratio back to target C-Ratio of {{targetCRatio}} you need to burn {{burnAmountToFixCRatio}}. Your balance is {{balance}} so there's no need to self liquidate.
info.delegate-wallet: As a delegated wallet you can't self liquidate.
info.balance-not-zero: Since your balance is not zero you should burn all your sUSD before self liquidating
info.self-liquidate-text: You can also opt to self liquidate and incur a {{selfLiquidationPenalty}} penalty on your staked SNX needed to bring you to the {{percentageTargetCRatio}} target. This would cause you to incur a penalty of {{amountToSelfLiquidate}} ({{amountToSelfLiquidateUsd}}).

info.tooltip: <0>Issued debt:</0> This displays the total of all your mints and burns over time, revealing how only your C-Ratio management has affected your debt.<1 /><2>Actual debt:</2> This displays your total debt over time.

info-panel.title: dSNX
info-panel.body: The Debt Mirror Index (dSNX) token is a tool that replicates the payoff of the synthetix debt index, enabling users to hedge their active debt exposure. 1 sUSD worth of dSNX pool token hedges approximately 1 USD worth of active debt. Learn how it works <0>here</0>.
info-panel.dsnx-warning: Warning: dSNX approximately hedges debt, users can incur losses.
info-panel.uniswap-link: Be mindful of price impact and use <0>this uniswap pool</0> to close dSNX positions.

1.title: BURN DEBT & NOMINATE ACCOUNT
1.description: In order to merge accounts, first you need Burn any outstanding debt from the address you want to merge from in order to transfer the vested SNX.

2.title: MERGE FROM DESTINATION ACCOUNT
2.description: Only when you have completed step 1 and logged into the destination account should you proceed with this step.

info.title: Burn sUSD Debt
info.description: Connect to the dApp with the wallet you wish to merge from, first make sure that you have burned all your sUSD debt. <0>Learn more.</0>

info.title: Merge Escrowed SNX To Nominated Account
info.subtitle: Merge your vested SNX balance by inputing the new destination address in the 'DESTINATION ADDRESS' field, this address is where you want your balances to be sent to. <0>Learn more.</0>

info.title: Merge Your Source Account To This One
info.description: Finally, please input the source address of where your balances have been sent from. <0>Learn more.</0>
